content.text: BatteryBrain is committed to customer satisfaction. If you're not satisfied with your purchase, you can return products within 30 days of delivery for a full refund or exchange.

list: The product must be in its original condition and packaging.
Returns must be initiated within 30 days of receiving the product.

ordered_list: Contact BatteryBrain customer support to initiate a return.
Pack the product securely in its original packaging.
Ship the product back to the address provided by customer support.

subsections.title: Time Frame
subsections.text: Refunds are processed within 5-10 business days after the returned product is received and inspected.

subsections.title: Method
subsections.text: Refunds will be issued to the original payment method used at the time of purchase.

subsections.title: Conditions
subsections.text: Exchanges are subject to product availability. If the desired product is not available, a refund will be issued.
